name: Carcassonne Scoreboard
description:
The app Carcassonne Scoreboard has been developed to manage the scores that players achieve during a Carcassonne game, complementing this wonderful board game.

Main features:

+ Attractive design
+ Easily adds and subtracts points
+ Automatically ranks players
+ Meeples race to determine who starts the game
+ Extra meeples by retrieving the reserved ones for the physical scoreboard
+ For games from 2 to 8 players
+ Compatible with most expansions

With Carcassonne Scoreboard you can get rid of the scoreboard provided with the game and manage each participant's score in an easier, more visual and funnier way.

In addition, by using Carcassonne Scoreboard you will free the meeples reserved for the physical scoreboard, thereby each participant is gaining a meeple which can be normally used during the development of the game.

Carcassonne Scoreboard also includes a "meeples race" to randomly determine which player starts the game.

Enjoy the app and do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question or suggestion:

contact@doscontrauno.com

Thank you for using Carcassonne Scoreboard!

- -

NOTE: The development of this application is completely independent of the board game called “Carcassonne”.
